entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight then changing to snow before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight and dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023
